entries.journal_entry_description: Sergeant Snopel is a retired Imperial Commando. Stories have it he fought on Geonosis, during the begining of the clone wars. If anyone knows of work a commando can do, he would.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Head over to the elevator and take it down to the lower level.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Lower Level
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to the appointed location and take the thugs out. Sergeant Snopel suggests you use the grenade he gave you.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Use the Grenade on the Thugs in Lower Level
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The thugs are dead, now use the Elevator to return to the main level.
entries.task02_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Now that you have taken out the thugs, return to the sergeant.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Use the elevator to head up to the Atrium.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Atrium
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Sergeant Snopel needs information pertaining to a shipment recently delivered here. He thinks his superiors might be interested. He has learned that a dock worker named Terry has a record of the shipment in his datapad. You are to retrieve that datapad with extreme violence, leave no witnesses.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Kill Terry and Take His Datapad in the Atrium
entries.task07_comm_message_text: Datapad was retrieved? Good, just send me the contents.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: You are sending Sgt. Snopel the contents of Terry's Datapad.
entries.task09_comm_message_text: No mention of a shipment, but apparently, Terry planted a bomb. You must stop this bomb from going off. There is no time to waste, I suggest you start searching one of the back rooms.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: The bomb is up here in the Atrium somwhere. You must find it, and defuse it. Hurry!
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Find the Bomb and Defuse it
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Now that you have killed the menacing creatures, use the elevator to return the main level.
entries.task11_journal_entry_title: Use the Elevator to go to the Main Level
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: You have defused the bomb, return to Sgt. Snopel. He will be anxiously awaiting your return.
